Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends java.lang.Object
    Models a simple, solid rectangle. This class represents a Rectabgle object. When combined with the GameArena class, instances of the Rectangle class can be displayed on the screen.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rectangle(double x, double y, double w, double h, java.lang.String col)
      Create a rectangle with the given parameters.
